name: Catch the gems !
description:
Description

This game was developped by some students during a training. It uses the Python arcade' game library.

The goal is to control a robot trying to catch all the gems falling from above its head. Just move the robot to catch the gems falling from above.

If you miss a gem, you lose a star. When you got no more star, the game is finished. You earn one point for each gem you can catch.

Try to go as far as you can !

Controls

Just move the robot toward LEFT/RIGHT using either the keyboard arrows or any gamepad controller.

You can press the D key or any button on the gamepad to teleport the robot toward the direction you are currently facing. It allows you to save some time and avoid missing a gem.
